text:
@MattHancock and how many people will be diagnosed with covid-19 within 14 days ya utter prat?

do NOT ever tell US that there is nothing to fear we are over the hump etc ... you haven't got a fucking clue! If you did you would NOT be returning horse racing on Monday ... moron!
